markdownRemark.html: I realised how much memory is consumed when trying to load too many embedded videos in one page. Hopefully, adding a spoiler tag can alleviate memory problems. If problems still persist, do not hestitate to get in touch with me. You may also want to try refreshing the cache (Ctrl+F5) first, however. Cheers!
